plot outline: Manaivi Amaivadhellam is a 2013 Tamil film, directed by K. Umachithra. The film stars Jeeva, Vinod Kumar, Rajeswari and Master Akash in lead roles. The film had musical score by K. Umachithra. Watch the full movie Manaivi Amaivadhellam online, only on Eros Now.
